languages.text: "К сожалению, нет. Леди Теодора спешила, и не стала задерживаться на планете. Ее люди забрали меня на корабль в беспамятстве, а когда я пришла в себя, мы уже летели прочь. О как надеюсь я снова встретиться лицом к лицу с этими еретиками! И когда-нибудь это обязательно произойдет".

traits.locale_text: "К сожалению, нет. Леди Теодора спешила, и не стала задерживаться на планете. Ее люди забрали меня на корабль в беспамятстве, а когда я пришла в себя, мы уже летели прочь. О как надеюсь я снова встретиться лицом к лицу с этими еретиками! И когда-нибудь это обязательно произойдет".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Sadly, they did not. Lady Theodora was in a hurry and chose not to stay on the planet. Her people took me to her ship while I was unconscious, and when I came to my senses, we were already flying away. Oh, how I pray to come face to face with those heretics once more! And it's bound to happen someday."
languages.original_text: "К сожалению, нет. Леди Теодора спешила, и не стала задерживаться на планете. Ее люди забрали меня на корабль в беспамятстве, а когда я пришла в себя, мы уже летели прочь. О как надеюсь я снова встретиться лицом к лицу с этими еретиками! И когда-нибудь это обязательно произойдет".

traits.locale_text: "Sadly, they did not. Lady Theodora was in a hurry and chose not to stay on the planet. Her people took me to her ship while I was unconscious, and when I came to my senses, we were already flying away. Oh, how I pray to come face to face with those heretics once more! And it's bound to happen someday."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “遗憾的是，那些敌人并没有被消灭。西奥多拉夫人当时很着急，没有继续在那颗行星上停留。当我不省人事的时候，她的人把我带到了船上，而当我醒过来的时候，我们早已飞走了。噢，我真希望能再次面对那些异端分子！总有一天，我会再次面对他们。”
languages.original_text: "Sadly, they did not. Lady Theodora was in a hurry and chose not to stay on the planet. Her people took me to her ship while I was unconscious, and when I came to my senses, we were already flying away. Oh, how I pray to come face to face with those heretics once more! And it's bound to happen someday."

traits.locale_text: “遗憾的是，那些敌人并没有被消灭。西奥多拉夫人当时很着急，没有继续在那颗行星上停留。当我不省人事的时候，她的人把我带到了船上，而当我醒过来的时候，我们早已飞走了。噢，我真希望能再次面对那些异端分子！总有一天，我会再次面对他们。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Sadly, they did not. Lady Theodora was in a hurry and chose not to stay on the planet. Her people took me to her ship while I was unconscious, and when I came to my senses, we were already flying away. Oh, how I pray to come face to face with those heretics once more! And it's bound to happen someday."

languages.text: «Lamentablemente no. Lady Theodora tenía prisa y eligió no permanecer en el planeta. Su gente me llevó a la nave mientras estaba inconsciente. Cuando recuperé el sentido, ya nos estábamos alejando. ¡Rezo por volver a enfrentarme a esos herejes una vez más! No me cabe duda de que sucederá».
languages.original_text: "Sadly, they did not. Lady Theodora was in a hurry and chose not to stay on the planet. Her people took me to her ship while I was unconscious, and when I came to my senses, we were already flying away. Oh, how I pray to come face to face with those heretics once more! And it's bound to happen someday."

traits.locale_text: «Lamentablemente no. Lady Theodora tenía prisa y eligió no permanecer en el planeta. Su gente me llevó a la nave mientras estaba inconsciente. Cuando recuperé el sentido, ya nos estábamos alejando. ¡Rezo por volver a enfrentarme a esos herejes una vez más! No me cabe duda de que sucederá».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「悲しいことに、彼らはそうしなかった。シオドーラ様は急いでいて、この惑星に留まらないことを選んだのだ。私が意識を失っている間に、彼女の部下が私を船に連れて行き、私が正気に戻ったときには、すでに飛び立ったあとだった。ああ、もう一度あの異端者たちとまみえたいものだ！だが、きっといつか巡り合う日が来ることだろう」
languages.original_text: "Sadly, they did not. Lady Theodora was in a hurry and chose not to stay on the planet. Her people took me to her ship while I was unconscious, and when I came to my senses, we were already flying away. Oh, how I pray to come face to face with those heretics once more! And it's bound to happen someday."

traits.locale_text: 「悲しいことに、彼らはそうしなかった。シオドーラ様は急いでいて、この惑星に留まらないことを選んだのだ。私が意識を失っている間に、彼女の部下が私を船に連れて行き、私が正気に戻ったときには、すでに飛び立ったあとだった。ああ、もう一度あの異端者たちとまみえたいものだ！だが、きっといつか巡り合う日が来ることだろう」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Leider nicht. Lady Theodora war in Eile und beschloss, nicht auf dem Planeten zu bleiben. Ihre Leute brachten mich auf ihr Schiff, während ich bewusstlos war, und als ich wieder zu mir kam, waren wir bereits unterwegs. Oh, wie ich darum bete, diesen Ketzern noch einmal gegenübertreten zu dürfen! Und es wird gewiss auch eines Tages geschehen."
languages.original_text: "Sadly, they did not. Lady Theodora was in a hurry and chose not to stay on the planet. Her people took me to her ship while I was unconscious, and when I came to my senses, we were already flying away. Oh, how I pray to come face to face with those heretics once more! And it's bound to happen someday."

traits.locale_text: "Leider nicht. Lady Theodora war in Eile und beschloss, nicht auf dem Planeten zu bleiben. Ihre Leute brachten mich auf ihr Schiff, während ich bewusstlos war, und als ich wieder zu mir kam, waren wir bereits unterwegs. Oh, wie ich darum bete, diesen Ketzern noch einmal gegenübertreten zu dürfen! Und es wird gewiss auch eines Tages geschehen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Malheureusement, non. Dame Théodora était pressée et elle a fait le choix de quitter la planète au plus vite. Son équipage m'a amenée dans son vaisseau alors que j'étais encore inconsciente, et lorsque je suis revenue à moi, nous étions déjà repartis. Oh, comme je rêve de retrouver ces hérétiques un jour ! Je sais que cette rencontre est vouée à se produire. »
languages.original_text: "Sadly, they did not. Lady Theodora was in a hurry and chose not to stay on the planet. Her people took me to her ship while I was unconscious, and when I came to my senses, we were already flying away. Oh, how I pray to come face to face with those heretics once more! And it's bound to happen someday."

traits.locale_text: « Malheureusement, non. Dame Théodora était pressée et elle a fait le choix de quitter la planète au plus vite. Son équipage m'a amenée dans son vaisseau alors que j'étais encore inconsciente, et lorsque je suis revenue à moi, nous étions déjà repartis. Oh, comme je rêve de retrouver ces hérétiques un jour ! Je sais que cette rencontre est vouée à se produire. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Maalesef hayır. Leydi Theodora'nın acelesi vardı, bu nedenle gezegende kalamadı. Mürettebatı, bilincim kapalıyken beni gemiye almış. Kendime geldiğimde çoktan kalkış yapmıştık. O kâfirlerle tekrar karşılaşmak için her gün dua ediyorum! Eninde sonunda karşılaşacağız, biliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Sadly, they did not. Lady Theodora was in a hurry and chose not to stay on the planet. Her people took me to her ship while I was unconscious, and when I came to my senses, we were already flying away. Oh, how I pray to come face to face with those heretics once more! And it's bound to happen someday."

traits.locale_text: "Maalesef hayır. Leydi Theodora'nın acelesi vardı, bu nedenle gezegende kalamadı. Mürettebatı, bilincim kapalıyken beni gemiye almış. Kendime geldiğimde çoktan kalkış yapmıştık. O kâfirlerle tekrar karşılaşmak için her gün dua ediyorum! Eninde sonunda karşılaşacağız, biliyorum."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
